event.title: carries visitors to and from Osier, Colorado, and Antonito, Colorado, during the summer

data.event: Chama is the western terminus of the Cumbres and Toltec Scenic Railroad, a steam-driven, narrow gauge heritage railway which carries visitors to and from Osier, Colorado, and Antonito, Colorado, during the summer months.
The route was abandoned in the late 1960s and the tracks from Chama westward to Durango were torn up soon afterwards.
